PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-12602002-07-170,  ,  TC,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the POLLUTANT DISCHARGE REPORTING REGULATIONS, 1995 by introducing a more precise definition of "waters under Canadian jurisdiction", by clarifying that the Regulations apply to "shipping safety control zones" as prescribed in the Arctic Waters Pollution Prevention Act, and by repealing section 3 and paragraph 5(1)(b).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0275 Publication Date: 2002-07-31
